Headline: Sugam Pokharel
Text: Sugam Pokharel is a CNN International news desk editor and producer, based at the network's headquarters in Atlanta.  As a producer on CNN's International Desk in Atlanta, Pokharel writes, edits and produces news content used on CNN's television and digital platforms. He collaborates with CNN's bureaus and journalists around the globe covering current news and major world events. Pokharel specializes in South Asia and spent more than five years from 2014 as a field producer at CNN's New Delhi bureau. During his tenure in New Delhi, he was deployed to cover breaking news stories in Bangladesh, Nepal, Sri Lanka, Thailand, Hong Kong and across India.  Pokharel, a Nepal native, began his CNN career in 2010 in New York, before moving to Atlanta and working for CNN's award-winning Freedom Project series. He is a graduate of the University of Evansville.
